name: Boulder Dash (C64)
overview: No One is a legend for Boulder Dash heads and this is considered one of the best Boulder Dash games for the Amiga. It underwent multiple versions over the years but contains levels converted from the C64 games from multiple Boulderdash games including Boulderdash, Boulderdash 2-4 and the Boulderdash Construction Kit. The setup screen might lead you to believe it supported the usual 2 players, in fact it only supports a single player.
